HomePage.title: Rodrigo Vildosola
HomePage.subtitle: Software Engineer
HomePage.description1: Full-Stack Web development and Software Design
HomePage.description2: Skilled in Machine Learning, cybersecurity, and data analysis. Proactive, adaptable, and motivated team player.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content1: I am a future Civil Engineer in Computer Science with nearly a year of experience in software development and web technologies. I have skills in Machine Learning, cybersecurity, and data analysis. I am proactive, adaptable, and highly motivated by my work, with a notable ability to work in teams. Currently, I am looking for opportunities in a dynamic environment that promotes professional growth and technological innovation.
aboutMe.content2: Outside of coding, I enjoy reading about new tech trends, going to the gym, spending time with family, going out with friends, and playing games.

items.description: Worked as a Full-Stack Developer on web applications, APIs, databases, and Machine Learning.
Studying Software Engineering with a focus on web development, data analysis, and machine learning.
Graduated with a focus on science and mathematics. Active in various extracurricular activities.
